alert.note: Alert for Gadsden (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gadsden and west central Leon Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 410 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Quincy, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Quincy, Midway, Havana, Freemont, Lake Talquin, Littman, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Gibson, Fort Braden, Fred George Park, Santa Clara, Shady Rest, Lake Jackson, Quincy Airport, Wetumpka, Branchville and Bloxham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
